title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through and an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C) is reached.
Remove chicken from grill and let rest for 5 minutes. Then, slice into strips.
In a large bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce and Caesar dressing. Toss until well coated.
Add grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese to the salad. Toss to combine.
